name: Connect Box Router (UPC / Ziggo / etc)
description:
Theme for the ConnextBox Cable Modem Router as provided by UPC / Ziggo (among others).

• Replaces the plain-text login-textfield with a password-textfield like one (i.e. non-visible passwords !)
• Enables the Hidden 'Check Router Status' link at the Login screen
• Some subtle styling of links, removing the default text-underline unless hovering

Note: If you don't use the router's default IP address of 192.168.178.1 you should replace this in the CSS-code to the correct IP address for your setup.
